DayDriver Class Documentation¶

class src.DayDriver.Driver(length)[source]¶

Initializes the schedule and begins simulation of scheduling

get_schedule_by_day(day_num)[source]¶

Gets the schedule of the specified day

Parameters:day_num – the day to get the schedule for
Returns:the schedule of the day specified
update_curr_schedule(new_schedule, day_num)[source]¶

Updates the current_day’s schedule

Parameters:
  • new_schedule – the new schedule for the day
  • day_num – the day to update the schedule on
Returns:

the new schedule for the day
